ideas.title: Write a love note
ideas.description: Leave a handwritten note somewhere they'll find it - their bag, pocket, or under their pillow.

ideas.title: Make their favorite meal
ideas.description: Surprise them by cooking their favorite dish for dinner tonight.

ideas.title: Give a long hug
ideas.description: Give them a genuine 20-second hug when you see them. No words needed.

ideas.title: Send a midday text
ideas.description: Send a message telling them one specific thing you love about them.

ideas.title: Do their chore
ideas.description: Take care of one of their usual tasks without being asked.

ideas.title: Plan a surprise date
ideas.description: Organize an unexpected date night - even if it's just a walk or movie at home.

ideas.title: Bring them a treat
ideas.description: Pick up their favorite snack or coffee on your way home.

ideas.title: Listen actively
ideas.description: Tonight, put away your phone and give them your full attention when they talk.

ideas.title: Compliment them publicly
ideas.description: Say something nice about them in front of friends or family.

ideas.title: Create a playlist
ideas.description: Make a playlist of songs that remind you of them or your relationship.

ideas.title: Give a massage
ideas.description: Offer a relaxing shoulder or foot massage after a long day.

ideas.title: Say thank you
ideas.description: Thank them for something specific they did recently that you appreciated.

ideas.title: Plan for the future
ideas.description: Talk about a trip or activity you'd like to do together someday.

ideas.title: Wake up first
ideas.description: Get up early and bring them breakfast in bed or coffee to start their day.

ideas.title: Send old photos
ideas.description: Find and share a favorite photo from your time together with a sweet caption.

ideas.title: Learn their interest
ideas.description: Ask them to teach you about something they're passionate about.

ideas.title: Small gift
ideas.description: Buy them something small that shows you listen - a book they mentioned, etc.

ideas.title: Physical affection
ideas.description: Hold their hand, kiss their forehead, or cuddle on the couch tonight.

ideas.title: Take over planning
ideas.description: Handle the mental load for something - grocery list, weekend plans, etc.

ideas.title: Remember the little things
ideas.description: Bring up a happy memory from your relationship and reminisce together.

ideas.title: Draw them a bath
ideas.description: Run a warm bath with candles and their favorite scents waiting for them.

ideas.title: Leave a voice memo
ideas.description: Record a short voice message telling them you're thinking of them.

ideas.title: Dance in the kitchen
ideas.description: Put on your favorite song and slow dance together while cooking.

ideas.title: Write 10 reasons
ideas.description: Give them a list of 10 reasons why you fell in love with them.

ideas.title: Pack their lunch
ideas.description: Prepare their lunch for the next day with a hidden love note inside.

ideas.title: Stargaze together
ideas.description: Find a quiet spot and spend time looking at the stars together.

ideas.title: Warm their towel
ideas.description: Put their towel in the dryer while they shower so it's warm when they get out.

ideas.title: Create a photo book
ideas.description: Compile your favorite photos together into a small printed book.

ideas.title: Kiss their forehead
ideas.description: Give them a gentle forehead kiss before they fall asleep.

ideas.title: Defend them
ideas.description: Stand up for them if someone speaks negatively about them.

ideas.title: Fill their car with gas
ideas.description: Fill up their gas tank so they don't have to worry about it.

ideas.title: Schedule a picnic
ideas.description: Pack a surprise picnic lunch and take them to a beautiful spot.

ideas.title: Send flowers
ideas.description: Have flowers delivered to them at work or home unexpectedly.

ideas.title: Bake their favorite dessert
ideas.description: Surprise them with a homemade version of their favorite sweet treat.

ideas.title: Write a poem
ideas.description: Compose a short, heartfelt poem about your feelings for them.

ideas.title: Hold hands in public
ideas.description: Reach for their hand while walking together in public.

ideas.title: Tell them you're proud
ideas.description: Express how proud you are of something they've accomplished.

ideas.title: Make breakfast together
ideas.description: Wake up and cook a nice breakfast together as a team.

ideas.title: Charge their phone
ideas.description: Plug in their phone at night so it's fully charged in the morning.

ideas.title: Buy their favorite magazine
ideas.description: Pick up a magazine or book they'd enjoy reading.

ideas.title: Wash their car
ideas.description: Clean their car inside and out as a surprise.

ideas.title: Frame your favorite photo
ideas.description: Print and frame a meaningful photo of you two together.

ideas.title: Make hot cocoa
ideas.description: Prepare a cozy cup of hot cocoa for a quiet evening in.

ideas.title: Write on the mirror
ideas.description: Leave a sweet message on the bathroom mirror with a dry-erase marker.

ideas.title: Brush their hair
ideas.description: Offer to gently brush or play with their hair while relaxing.

ideas.title: Tell them they're beautiful
ideas.description: Look them in the eyes and tell them how attractive they are to you.

ideas.title: Plan a game night
ideas.description: Set up a fun board game or card game night just for the two of you.

ideas.title: Do the dishes
ideas.description: Clean up after dinner so they can relax.

ideas.title: Bring home their comfort food
ideas.description: Pick up their go-to comfort meal from their favorite restaurant.

ideas.title: Write future envelopes
ideas.description: Create sealed envelopes with notes to open on future dates.

ideas.title: Cuddle and watch a movie
ideas.description: Choose their favorite movie and spend the evening cuddling.

ideas.title: Apologize first
ideas.description: After a disagreement, be the first to apologize sincerely.

ideas.title: Take a walk together
ideas.description: Go for a quiet neighborhood walk just to spend time together.

ideas.title: Fold their laundry
ideas.description: Fold and put away their clean clothes before they get to it.

ideas.title: Gift a cozy blanket
ideas.description: Surprise them with a soft, cozy blanket for relaxing.

ideas.title: Make their coffee
ideas.description: Prepare their morning coffee or tea exactly the way they like it.

ideas.title: Hide sticky notes
ideas.description: Place small encouraging notes in random places they'll find throughout the day.

ideas.title: Scratch their back
ideas.description: Offer a gentle back scratch while watching TV together.

ideas.title: Share a dream
ideas.description: Tell them about a dream you have for your future together.

ideas.title: Cook a new recipe
ideas.description: Try making a new dish together as a fun experiment.

ideas.title: Take out the trash
ideas.description: Handle the garbage before they have to think about it.

ideas.title: Give a thoughtful book
ideas.description: Buy them a book you think they'd love with a personal inscription.

ideas.title: Make a smoothie
ideas.description: Blend up a healthy, delicious smoothie for them.

ideas.title: Text a memory
ideas.description: Send them a text describing your favorite memory of the two of you.

ideas.title: Rest your head on them
ideas.description: Lean on their shoulder while sitting together.

ideas.title: Express gratitude
ideas.description: Tell them three things you're grateful for about them today.

ideas.title: Watch the sunrise
ideas.description: Wake up early and watch the sunrise together.

ideas.title: Prepare their bag
ideas.description: Pack their work or gym bag with everything they need.

ideas.title: Upgrade their favorite item
ideas.description: Replace something they use daily with a nicer version.

ideas.title: Surprise breakfast tacos
ideas.description: Make or pick up surprise breakfast tacos on a weekend morning.

ideas.title: Create a love jar
ideas.description: Fill a jar with folded notes of things you love about them.

ideas.title: Rub their feet
ideas.description: Give them a relaxing foot rub after a long day.

ideas.title: Say I love you creatively
ideas.description: Find a new, creative way to express your love today.

ideas.title: Visit somewhere new
ideas.description: Explore a new coffee shop, trail, or neighborhood together.

ideas.title: Clean the bathroom
ideas.description: Deep clean the bathroom before they even notice it needs it.

ideas.title: Gift a subscription
ideas.description: Sign them up for a subscription box of something they love.

ideas.title: Make fresh-squeezed juice
ideas.description: Prepare fresh juice or a special drink just for them.

ideas.title: Write a letter
ideas.description: Compose a heartfelt letter expressing your feelings and mail it to them.

ideas.title: Play with their hair
ideas.description: Gently run your fingers through their hair while relaxing.

ideas.title: Acknowledge their efforts
ideas.description: Recognize something they've been working hard on lately.

ideas.title: Have a phone-free dinner
ideas.description: Put away all devices and focus entirely on each other during dinner.

ideas.title: Iron their clothes
ideas.description: Iron or steam their outfit for the next day.

ideas.title: Create custom jewelry
ideas.description: Gift them a personalized piece of jewelry with a special meaning.

ideas.title: Order their favorite takeout
ideas.description: Surprise them by ordering their favorite takeout for dinner.

ideas.title: Leave a card on their desk
ideas.description: Place a thoughtful card where they'll find it at work or home.

ideas.title: Wrap them in a blanket
ideas.description: Tuck them into a cozy blanket when they're cold.

ideas.title: Brag about them
ideas.description: Talk highly about them to a friend when they're not around.

ideas.title: Weekend morning together
ideas.description: Spend a lazy weekend morning in bed together, just talking.

ideas.title: Handle an errand
ideas.description: Take care of an errand they've been putting off.

ideas.title: Get matching items
ideas.description: Buy a small matching set of something - mugs, keychains, etc.

ideas.title: Pack a snack
ideas.description: Slip their favorite snack into their bag for later.

ideas.title: Doodle a picture
ideas.description: Draw a silly or sweet doodle and leave it for them to find.

ideas.title: Warm up the bed
ideas.description: Get into bed first to warm up their side on cold nights.

ideas.title: Recall your first date
ideas.description: Bring up a favorite moment from your first date together.

ideas.title: Library date
ideas.description: Spend an afternoon browsing a bookstore or library together.

ideas.title: Make the bed
ideas.description: Make the bed with fresh sheets so it's extra cozy at night.

ideas.title: Gift a plant
ideas.description: Give them a small plant or succulent to brighten their space.

ideas.title: Midnight snack run
ideas.description: Surprise them with a late-night snack run just because.

ideas.title: Send a postcard
ideas.description: Mail a postcard with a sweet message, even if you live together.

ideas.title: Link arms while walking
ideas.description: Walk arm-in-arm when you're out together.
